title: Cuisinart Air Fryer Oven – 4.5-Qt Basket Black and Stainless Steel Air Fryer – Dishwasher-Safe Parts with 4 Presets – Roast, Bake, Broil, Air Fry and Keep Warm – Quick & Easy Meals – AIR-160
description: Prepare a variety of dishes, from quick snacks to hearty meals, effortlessly with the versatile Cuisinart® 4.5-qt Basket Air Fryer. Air Advantage™ technology ensures healthier, crispy, and flavorful results every time. Featuring a large 8”x8” cooking surface area for more even cooking plus four cooking functions, a toss reminder, and a convenient viewing window, it simplifies air frying, roasting and baking. Four easy-to-use air fry presets takes the guesswork out of air frying your favorites.
